text: I need to help Pug find his friends and collect resources!
Woof! Thank you for helping me find my friends!
Woof woof! I think I can help with this puzzle!
Meow! I'm Brak. I can give you hints if you need help!
Don't worry! Try thinking about it differently. Here's a hint!
Grrr! You can't pass unless you solve my puzzle!
Nooo! You got me! But I'll be back!
You found a treasure chest! Open it to get rewards!
Not quite right. Let Brak help you!
You collected a building tool part! Collect both parts to build the portal!
Amazing! The portal is complete! You can now travel to the next world!
